text: @parscale @realDonaldTrump You're also making attendees sign a waiver, so they can't blame you if/when they happen to catch #COVID19.  Here's what you didn't plan for:  What happens when those infected at your hate rally spread it to everyone they come in contact with?  That'll be a real mess, huh?
